message:
DataGrids are problematic, because they just don't work well with async. The same is true for DataTable and friends.

You can start an asynchronous operation from a synchronous data-bound property by using a NotifyTask kind of trick: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/archive/msdn-magazine/2014/march/async-programming-patterns-for-asynchronous-mvvm-applications-data-binding is an article about MVVM, but the same kind of trick can also be used with WinForms.

Hope this helps!
